creator: Poehlmann, Tristan, author.$$QPoehlmann, Tristan
publisher: Minneapolis, Minnesota : Essential Library, an imprint of Adbo Publishing
description: The Stonewall Riots discusses how in 1969, lesbian, gay, bisexual, and transgender people stood up for their rights against a society that criminalized their natural feelings, launching a movement whose legacy continues to this day. Aligned to Common Core Standards and correlated to state standards. Essential Library is an imprint of Abdo Publishing, a division of ABDO.
contents: Ch. 1. The riot -- ch. 2. Activism before Stonewall -- ch. 3. Inside the Stonewall Inn -- ch. 4. Outside the Stonewall Inn -- ch. 5. Saturday night -- ch. 6. The next nights -- ch. 7. The immediate impact -- ch. 8. The Stonewall legacy.
relation: $$Cform$$VPrint version: Poehlmann, Tristan. Stonewall Riots. Minneapolis, Minnesota : Essential Library, an imprint of Adbo Publishing, [2017]$$QStonewall Riots.
